Title: Kinect Controlled Robot
Description:
Kinect Controlled Robot:

This Is a small independant project that is designed to help me learn the C# language in a fun and Hands on way. 

Involves the Kinect sensor, GHI FEZ Panda 2, and some basic networking.

Project Description
